original_text:
Its rising is from the end of the heavens,
    and its circuit to the end of them,
    and there is nothing hidden from its heat.
korean_text: 하늘 이 끝에서 나와서 하늘 저 끝까지 운행함이여 그의 열기에서 피할 자가 없도다

sentences.original_text: Its rising is from the end of the heavens
and its circuit to the end of them
and there is nothing hidden from its heat.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것의 열기에서 숨겨진 것은 아무것도 없습니다.
